column2: "Looks... like... we managed..."
"You really did it. You two definitely surprised me there."
"Don't worry about us, is he okay?"
"No problems here. Camalots and I are doing great."
"Looks like we solved the mystery of the distress signal. He must have stepped on it."
"But I wonder what ARKS equipment was doing here in the first place?"
"I'm really grateful for what you've done."
"What? I don't think I really did that much, did I?"
"No, it really means a lot to us."
"You don't have a lot of natural talent. In fact, sometimes you're so bad, it's almost hard to look at."
"Spare me the details."
"But, you did your best to help me look and the results reflect that."
"So I hope you'll accept my thanks."
"Don't get too confident though. Otherwise, there will be a lot more victims than the two of us here."
"Hey! Watch it! What are you-!?"
"Sorry, I could have sworn there was an enemy right here."
"The only thing in front of your face is us!"
"Shut up! We found your stupid little pal here, so would you hurry up and get out of my face?"
"You don't need to tell me twice. See if I thank you again!"
"Fine! You're welcome!"
"What a day. I'm going to head back first."
"Echo（Hunter）can now be called as a partner."
"His Will Inherited"
"第1章 受け継がれる意志"
